text: Xavier Bettel (born 3 March 1973) is a Luxembourgian politician and lawyer. He was the 24th Prime Minister of Luxembourg from 2013 to 2023. He replaced Jean- Claude Juncker. He has served as Mayor of Luxembourg City, member of the Chamber of Deputies and member of the Luxembourg City communal council. Bettel is a member of the Democratic Party. Bettel is openly gay. He is one of three openly gay world leaders in office, the others being Leo Varadkar, the prime minister of Ireland;"Leo Varadkar, gay son of Indian immigrant, to be next Irish PM." The Guardian. 2017-06-02. title: Xavier Bettel
